hours_text:
# Visit

## Hours & Admission

### Special Hours (if applicable)

### Hours

5/15/2025 8/15/2025 Hours of operation for Summer 2025. Days are listed in each row of the first column. Hours of operation are listed in the second column of each row.  Day | Summer 2025 Hours  
---|---  
**Monday** | Closed  
**Tuesday** | Closed  
**Wednesday** | Closed  
**Thursday** | 9:00 am–5:00 pm  
**Friday** | 9:00 am–5:00 pm  
**Saturday** | 10:00 am–4:00 pm  
**Sunday** | 12:00 pm–4:00 pm  
8/16/2025 Hours of operation. Days are listed in each row of the first column. Hours of operation are listed in the second column of each row.  Day | Open Hours  
---|---  
**Monday** | Closed  
**Tuesday** | 12:00 pm–5:00 pm  
**Wednesday** | 9:00 am–5:00 pm  
**Thursday** | 9:00 am–5:00 pm  
**Friday** | 9:00 am–5:00 pm  
**Saturday** | 10:00 am–4:00 pm  
**Sunday** | 12:00 pm–4:00 pm  
  
The Museum is closed on [University holidays (external link)](https://calendars.illinois.edu/list/468) and often stays open late for [public events](/events/). 

### Admission

Admission is **free** , but we suggest a [donation of $5 (external link)](https://www.givecampus.com/campaigns/49445/donations/new?designation_id=11334621&amt=5.00) to support Museum programming and initiatives.

During the month of November, we are encouraging you to consider [donating to the HRI food pantry for Odyssey Students](/blog/p/spurlock-serves-as/484) to support our local community, in lieu of a cash donation to the Museum.

The Museum is closed on [University holidays (external link)](https://calendars.illinois.edu/list/468) and often stays open late for [public events](/events/). 

### Admission

Admission is **free** , but we suggest a [donation of $5 (external link)](https://www.givecampus.com/campaigns/49445/donations/new?designation_id=11334621&amt=5.00) to support Museum programming and initiatives.

During the month of November, we are encouraging you to consider [donating to the HRI food pantry for Odyssey Students](/blog/p/spurlock-serves-as/484) to support our local community, in lieu of a cash donation to the Museum.
